pacman.game.model

Class GameContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • pacman.game.model.GameContext

  • public final class GameContext
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that contains important game variables such as score, lives etc. It houses functions that allow game data to be accessed.

      • addScore

        public void addScore(int score)
        Function that adds the given score to the scoreboard and to the highScore if applicable.
        Parameters:
        score - Score to be added

      • decreasePacmanLives

        public void decreasePacmanLives()
        Function that removes one player life.

      • eatBigGum

        public void eatBigGum(boolean eat)
        Function that triggers the "edible ghosts".
        Parameters:
        eat - If true, the ghosts become edible.

      • endGame

        public void endGame()
        Function that ends the game.

      • getInstance

        public static GameContext getInstance()

      • getPacmanInitPos

        public com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 getPacmanInitPos()
        Function used to get the initial position of Pacman. Useful when pacman is rebirth to send him to the start position.
        Returns:
        Returns a Libgdx Vector2 position (x,y)

      • getPacmanLives

        public int getPacmanLives()
        Get the remaining pacan lives
        Returns:
        pacmanLives property (integer)

      • hasGameEnded

        public boolean hasGameEnded()
        Function used to check if the game over flag is true or false
        Returns:
        gameOver property, can be true or false

        public void setPacmanInvencible(boolean invencible)
        Function that makes the player invincible or not.
        Parameters:
        invencible - If true, the player is made invincible.

      • wasBigGumEated

        public boolean wasBigGumEated()
        Function to check if the Big Gum has been eated so the engine can make the ghosts weak

        biGumEaten property (true/false)
